content:
From: Olga Vovk <ovovk@samvit-solutions.com>
Dear all,
I need to capture the information about blood transfusion given to a given patient.
Specifically I need to capture the following information:

1. Number of units of blood component/product transfused into a given patient;
2. Name(s) of a specific blood products.
And I am totally confused what would be the best way to capture this information.

Thank you!

Olga Vovk
<:3)))~~~~

This still is in discussion with Patient Care. See J#8458 and the April and May 2021 meeting minutes linked within the JIRA. Patient Care is headed down a path of proposing a new resource for the BloodProductAdministration, but that is not yet approved by FMG.
Also, see http://build.fhir.org/biologicallyderivedproduct.html for the Blood Product, itself

Hi Michelle,
Thank you so much for this information!!!
Best,
Olga

Hi Michelle,
